languages.text: {n}Чем дольше вы слушаете Вайса, тем больше убеждаетесь, что причиной варп-манифестации стали не козни Губительных сил, а усилия, приложенные для обнаружения невероятно чуждого сознания. Такой неестественный разум может принадлежать опасному ксеносу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Чем дольше вы слушаете Вайса, тем больше убеждаетесь, что причиной варп-манифестации стали не козни Губительных сил, а усилия, приложенные для обнаружения невероятно чуждого сознания. Такой неестественный разум может принадлежать опасному ксеносу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чем дольше вы слушаете Вайса, тем больше убеждаетесь, что причиной варп-манифестации стали не козни Губительных сил, а усилия, приложенные для обнаружения невероятно чуждого сознания. Такой неестественный разум может принадлежать опасному ксеносу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plus vous écoutez Weisz, plus vous êtes {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que la manifestation du Warp n'est pas due aux manigances des Puissances de la Ruine, mais aux efforts consentis pour démasquer un esprit aussi éloigné qu'on peut l'être de la psyché humaine. Un esprit si contrefait qu'il pourrait bien appartenir à un dangereux xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plus vous écoutez Weisz, plus vous êtes {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que la manifestation du Warp n'est pas due aux manigances des Puissances de la Ruine, mais aux efforts consentis pour démasquer un esprit aussi éloigné qu'on peut l'être de la psyché humaine. Un esprit si contrefait qu'il pourrait bien appartenir à un dangereux xénos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuanto más escuchas a Weisz, más te convences de que la manifestación de la disformidad no fue a causa de una conspiración de los Poderes Ruinosos, sino de los esfuerzos empleados para descubrir una mente alienígena. Una mente tan fuera de lo común podría pertenecer a los peligrosos xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuanto más escuchas a Weisz, más te convences de que la manifestación de la disformidad no fue a causa de una conspiración de los Poderes Ruinosos, sino de los esfuerzos empleados para descubrir una mente alienígena. Una mente tan fuera de lo común podría pertenecer a los peligrosos xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ワイズの話を聞けば聞くほど、<歪み>の顕現は「禍つ神々」の策略によるものではなく、極めて異質な心を見つけるための努力によるものだと確信していった。そのような不自然な心は、危険な異種族のものかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズの話を聞けば聞くほど、<歪み>の顕現は「禍つ神々」の策略によるものではなく、極めて異質な心を見つけるための努力によるものだと確信していった。そのような不自然な心は、危険な異種族のものかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你越是听威茨讲述他的看法，就越是坚信——亚空间的异常状况并非源于肆虐的毁灭之力，而是因为你打算寻找的目标是某种极其古怪的外界生物。这种截然不同的意识，可能源自某种危险的异形。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你越是听威茨讲述他的看法，就越是坚信——亚空间的异常状况并非源于肆虐的毁灭之力，而是因为你打算寻找的目标是某种极其古怪的外界生物。这种截然不同的意识，可能源自某种危险的异形。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je länger du Weisz zuhörst, desto mehr bist du überzeugt, dass nicht die Bosheit der Mächte der Zerstörung Grund für die Manifestation des Warps war, sondern die Bemühungen, einen außerirdischen Verstand aufzuspüren. Ein derart unnatürlicher Verstand könnte einem gefährlichen Xenos gehören.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen to Weisz, the more convinced you become that the warp manifestation was not caused by the conniving of the Ruinous Powers, but by the efforts made to discover an incredibly alien mind. Such an unnatural mind could belong to a dangerous xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je länger du Weisz zuhörst, desto mehr bist du überzeugt, dass nicht die Bosheit der Mächte der Zerstörung Grund für die Manifestation des Warps war, sondern die Bemühungen, einen außerirdischen Verstand aufzuspüren. Ein derart unnatürlicher Verstand könnte einem gefährlichen Xenos gehören.{/n}
